summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing the Director to enter into Grant Agreement Number 1-95-673-040 with the State of Washington, Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development, for Mitigation Grant Project funds; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services, and making a contingent, reimbursable appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
